name: Girls games: Painting and coloring
description: Free girls coloring book and drawing game for women of all ages.. This free drawing game is filled with coloring pages and is designed to be fun for girls, teenagers and adult women.   The broad range of coloring designs and drawing tools is fun and easy to use for a mixed audience of all ages, from young to old. Easy navigation make it fun for grown up women, but also easy to use for a girl. We get lots of positive feedback from women of all ages, little girls, teenagers and adult women. Even grandmothers think it is fun to paint and color in this app.  Download this app for a girl or woman now and start drawing and painting and share your drawings with family or friends.   -Fun to play - Over 120 coloring pages from simple to intricate -Share your drawing via email, Facebook, etc. -Save and load your coloring pages -Create your own drawing -Many, many different colors -Easy navigation for kids and toddlers.  Lots of designs for girls of clothes and fashion, hair and hairdressing salon, princesses and make-up, horses and mermaids. For adult women we have coloring pages of mandala, flowers, hearts, owls and butterflies and floral patterns.  And once the coloring page is ready, you or your kid can easily share it on Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp or email to family and friends. For more coloring pages have a look with our other games.  Nice for girls which like clothes or fashion, hair salon and hairdressing, princesses and mermaids or horses. And for older woman we have more intricate designs of flowers, hearts and mandalas  All copyrights are owned by 2 Monkeys. Only use for non commercial purposes is allowed.
